name: Jumpy Trump
description:
*this game is 100% political incorrect*

In this game you play as Trump or Obama, you need to try to avoid the blocks that fly to the left that build the wall. But everytime a block hits the left, and the wall start to build up. You need to hit blocks in order to stop building of the wall. But remeber you only got 3 lives! Lives refill after 5 seconds. Use the arrows keys to scroll trough the menu and space to start play. You use space aswell for jumping.

(Game made with Game Maker)
